link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2013/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2021-03-24/ifrs-full http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2021-03-24/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2021-03-24.xsd http://www.cmfchile.cl/cl/fr/ci/2022-01-03 ../../cl-ci_cor_2022-01-03.xsd

va:valueAssertion.test: if (count(//cl-ci:DateOfEndOfReportingPeriod) eq 1) then (if (//cl-ci:DateOfEndOfReportingPeriod eq xs:date('2022-12-31')) then (count(//cl-ci:UtilidadLiquidaDistribuible[xs:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:period(.))) eq xs:date('2023-01-01')]) eq 1) else true()) else true()
